    public class AuthorizeDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.dialog/AuthorizeDialog.java

    Dialog to be displayed while the authorization process is running.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk
